snippet: Members of the Church of Almighty God, an offshoot of Christianity, are accused of beating and kicking a woman to death after she resisted recruitment in a McDonald’s restaurant.
abstract: Trial in eastern China begins for five members of the Church of Almighty God, Christianity offshoot condemned by the government, who are accused of beating and kicking Wu Shuoyan to death in McDonald's restaurant after she resisted their attempt to recruit her into the sect; conviction of homicide charges against the four women and one man could result in their execution.
lead_paragraph: Members of the Church of Almighty God, an offshoot of Christianity, are accused of beating and kicking a woman to death after she resisted recruitment in a McDonald’s restaurant.

headline.main: China Says 5 in Sect Killed Woman Who Wouldn’t Join
headline.print_headline: China Says 5 in Sect Killed Woman Who Wouldn’t Join
